car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: But, what if the bike lanes then become congested?
sentences.chinese: 但是，自行車道要是變得擁擠那怎麼辦？

sentences.english: It is a barefaced lie to say there are few bike lanes in China.
sentences.chinese: 說在中國很少有自行車道是一個無恥的謊言。

sentences.english: Cycling around the Hualien sea-front bike trail.
sentences.chinese: 悠遊於花蓮濱海自行車道內。

sentences.english: Inside, the floor will appear in epoxy, the light-blue bicycle path respectively.
sentences.chinese: 內部，地板分別呈現爲環氧樹脂和淡藍色自行車道。

sentences.english: The project will also upgrade existing tram lines, bus stops, and bicycle paths.
sentences.chinese: 該項目還將改造現有的電車線和自行車道。

sentences.english: The synthetic light-blue coating used in Denmark for bicycle paths will cover the roof.
sentences.chinese: 在丹麥用於自行車道的合成淡藍色塗層覆蓋屋頂。

sentences.english: The road shoulder was the Changbin bike trail.
Synthetic light-blue coating used in Denmark for bicycle paths will cover the roof.
sentences.chinese: 合成淡藍色塗層用丹麥自行車道將覆蓋屋頂。

sentences.english: I cycled for over two hours without seeing a car, or even a scooter.
sentences.chinese: 但是自行車道規劃得很好，不會跟汽車搶道，很安全。

sentences.english: What do you think about the cycling roads in London?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得倫敦的自行車道怎麼樣？

sentences.english: but I do bike in the bike lanes on First Avenue.
sentences.chinese: 不過我會在第一大街的自行車道上騎車。

definition: to drive a vehicle/movement of vehicles
Tuku town in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan
along the line (e.g. railway)/the region near the line
bay bridge (elevated bridge across stretch of water)
